item.title: TAKAUD will be hosting its first-ever Middle East Pensions Conference
item.description:
Source: _Middle East Pensions Conference _website. With the support of the Central Bank of Bahrain, TAKAUD, a leading provider of savings, investment, and pension solutions in the MENA region, is gathering government officials and financial service leaders to discuss the development of robust pension plans for citizens and foreign workers across the region. The first-ever Middle East Pensions Conference will occur in Bahrain on October 18, 2016. The conference aims to raise awareness and encourage action towards bringing Middle Eastern pension standards in line with developed countries...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/takaud-will-be-hosting-its-first-ever-middle-east-pensions-conference/
